item.description:
PLEIN AIR OUTING ANNOUNCEMENT

WHEN: 3 hours starting at the posted time

THE SCENE: An historic mill surrounded by woods and a tiny stream and open grass with surrounding trees. There are people but not many.

WHERE TO MEET: At the posted time, with 1/2 hour leeway for late-comers.

DIRECTIONS:
From 128:
1. Take Route 20W exit
2.Continue straight about 20 minutes to Sudbury. You'll pass a very scenic intersection (w/lights), a hardware store on your right, a garden store on your left. Several strip malls.
3. Eventually you'll find a SMALL sign to your right at a fork in the road marked "Wayside Inn". Take that fork right.
5. Continue straight about 1/2 mile or so. The Mill will be on your left. There should be quite a few cars parked there.

THINGS TO BRING WHICH ARE OFTEN FORGOTTEN:
Mosquito repellant, Paper towels, Sweater, water, food

CAR-POOL: If you need a ride or are willing to drive, say so in your RSVP.

IF LOST: If you become lost getting there, call.

LAX: We allow a leisurely 30 minutes for late-ness. If you show up within 30 minutes of the scheduled time you are fine.

INCLEMENT WEATHER: It is up to you to determine if the weather makes painting untenable. Although, I will try to leave a message on my voice mail if I myself do not intend to be there.

Michael Emerald
617/968-0627
westpointusma@yahoo.com
item.name: PLEIN AIR OUTING: Wayside Inn Mill
